articles.author: 9News Staff
articles.title: UN Security Council calls rare session, Americans urged to leave Russia - 9News
articles.description: The UN Security Council has voted for the 193-member General Assembly to hold an emergency session on Russia's invasion of Ukraine tomorrow.

articles.author: Edward Pevos | epevos@MLive.com
articles.title: Katy Perry, Lionel Richie have heated debate over Aretha Franklin’s granddaughter on ‘American Idol’ - MLive.com
articles.description: See whether Grace Franklin could make it through to Hollywood after Perry walked off the set.
articles.content: Shes the granddaughter of one of the greatest singers in music history. Grace Franklin auditioned on the season 20 premiere of American Idol airing on Sunday, February 27, 2020 and her audition cause… [+2973 chars]
